casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert BISHOP. No. 223PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bishop, Robert. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Calvin Scott Meyers, Raleigh, for Electronic Frontier Foundation. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of September 2015 by Eugene Volokh for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
